desc: Visit Majestic Sit & Sleep in Vancouver for the Best Value & Selection on Organic Latex Mattresses. We have been Vancouver's Leading Mattress store for Canadian Made, Natural Mattresses for over 30 years. All Mattresses come with a 120 Day Comfort Guarantee & 10-Year Warranty.

layout.text: Get the best-ever sleep! Majestic offers luxurious, exceptionally comfortable and supportive mattresses at prices you'll surely love. See and feel them to believe.
